translation.en: GIRL 1: Today's the day. GIRL 2: All right.
GIRL 3: I feel good about this one.
GIRL 1: Us three witches are fire.
GIRL 2: I don't know why we keep trying without a fourth.
GIRL 1: Oh, here she goes.
GIRL 2: What? It's been two years.
GIRL 1: Maybe we don't need a fourth.
GIRL 2: Yeah, you need all four.
Each crescent moon is an element. See? North, south, east, west.
translation.ja: エレメントは４つ 北 南 東 西

translation.en: GIRL 3: I wanna freeze time.
GIRL 1: We couldn't freeze time if we had a fourth.
I have it on the table, Frankie. You need to hold it, or else you're gonna light something on fire.
translation.ja: 気をつけないと 燃え移るよ

translation.en: All right, ladies.
Don't put it out.
I have to. We have to do the ritual.
Frankie, watch out.
You're always lighting things on fire, bro.
translation.ja: いつも何か焦がしてる

translation.en: Not this time. GIRL 1: Y'all witches ready?
translation.ja: 今日は大丈夫 準備はいい？

translation.en: ALL [CHANTING]: As the night receives Your light And the oceans feel your pull
translation.ja: 夜が光を受け 海が引力を感じる

translation.en: I set my intention To grow with you From new to full
translation.ja: 我は新月から満月へと 満ちゆく

translation.en: I summon the spirits of the North,
translation.ja: 我は北の精霊を召喚する

translation.en: spirit of earth and body,
translation.ja: 我は北の精霊を召喚する 土と体と泥の精霊なり

translation.en: spirit of dirt.
translation.ja: 土と体と泥の精霊なり

translation.en: ALL: Blessed be.
I summon the spirits of the East,
translation.ja: 我は東の精霊を召喚する

translation.en: spirit of air, spirit of new beginnings, spirit of breath.
translation.ja: 我は東の精霊を召喚する 風と始まりと息吹の精霊なり

translation.en: ALL: Blessed be.
I summon the spirits of the South,
translation.ja: 我は南の精霊を召喚する

translation.en: spirit of fire and will, spirit of heat.
translation.ja: 火と意志と熱の精霊なり

translation.en: ALL: Blessed be.
Tabby, can you just pretend you didn't summon the Southern spirits and do the spirits of the West?
translation.ja: タビー　南は忘れて 西の精霊を召喚して

translation.en: What? No. That's whack. I already did mine.
Someone needs to. It's not gonna work otherwise.
translation.ja: 誰かが やらないと

translation.en: If we're gonna be honest, the spirits of the West have been messin' shit up for a while now,
translation.ja: “西洋の精神”は ロクなことしないから⸺

translation.en: so why don't we just leave 'em out.
She's got a valid point.
And, look, anyways, it starts with East.
translation.ja: 本来は東から 始めるべきだしね

translation.en: East, South, West--
translation.ja: 本来は東から 始めるべきだしね ４人いないから 基本の魔術しかできない

translation.en: See, this is why we can only do basic magick. We've never had a fourth.
translation.ja: ４人いないから 基本の魔術しかできない

translation.en: How many times have we tried to telepathically communicate?
Oh, my God! You're obsessed
with telepathically communicating. Read the book.
translation.ja: テレパシーに執着しすぎ 本を読みなよ

translation.en: "So it shall be sealed and done When all four corners Meet as one"
translation.ja: “四方の角がそろう時 魔女の力は完全となる”

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait.
Oh, shit!
It's your jam. Yes! Okay, here we go.
translation.ja: ママの曲だ　歌おう

translation.en: BOTH: ♪ I'm broke but I'm happy ♪ ♪ I'm poor but I'm kind ♪
translation.ja: 私は金欠だけど幸せ 　　　貧乏だけど優しい

translation.en: ♪ I'm short But I'm healthy, yeah ♪
♪ I'm high but I'm grounded ♪ ♪ I'm sane But I'm overwhelmed ♪
translation.ja: ハイだけどしっかり者 　　マトモだけど困惑してる

translation.en: ♪ I'm lost, but I'm hopeful Baby ♪
translation.ja: 道を見失ってるけど 　　　　希望を持ってる

translation.en: ♪ And what it all Comes down to ♪
♪ Is that I haven't got It all figured out just-- ♪
translation.ja: まだよく分かってない

translation.en: Shit. You know the words.
translation.ja: ちょっと　歌えるくせに

translation.en: Aw. Sorry.
Aw, baby. Ugh. Blah.
Oh, no, no, no. You can...cry.
translation.ja: 別にいいのよ 泣いても

translation.en: All right, get it out.
I get it, man. This is... This is weird, though, isn't it?
translation.ja: 気持ちは よく分かる 変な感じよね

translation.en: Oh...
Look it, we're having all the feels.
translation.ja: 泣いたり笑ったりね 着いたら 私のメイクを直して

translation.en: You'll have to do my makeup when we get there. Okay. I got you.
translation.ja: 着いたら 私のメイクを直して

translation.en: Turn it back up, please.
How are my brows?
They look great.
Okay.
You look beautiful.
You do.
Okay. I do.
You ready? I'm nervous.
All right, let's do this. Okay.
translation.ja: いいわ　行きましょ

translation.en: Hello.
I see you made it in one piece. Yeah, it's--
Is that another piece of you I see right here?
Hi, Lily. I finally got you here.
It's nice to see you again.
Last time was on your turf though, so now it's my home-court advantage.
translation.ja: 前回はアウェーで会ったが

translation.en: That's a sports metaphor.
A metaphor, sort of like analogy. Oh, yeah. I get it.
Yeah, I get it.
Dad joke. Guilty.
translation.ja: 親父ギャグだ　すまん

translation.en: That's a cool camera.
Thanks. HELEN: It is, isn't it?
Let's take a picture. You know? Commemorate the moment.
That's a great idea.
May I? Okay.
It's not really a selfie thing, but here.
translation.ja: 自撮りに向かないけど

translation.en: Ooh, wow, analog.
Dig it. Old school.
translation.ja: イカすね　気に入った

translation.en: Ready?
All right. Come on in and meet the boys. They're really excited to meet you.
translation.ja: じゃ 中へ入って 息子たちを紹介する

translation.en: I think they even bathed.
ADAM: This is Isaiah. Hey.
ADAM: Jacob. Hi.
ADAM: And Abe.
JACOB: What the hell? Hey, give Lily the good seat.
translation.ja: リリーが特等席だ　詰めて

translation.en: Move. [BOTH GRUNTING]
Isaiah, just move over!
Cut it out, hey!
Settle down.
A little birdie told me mint chip was your favorite.
translation.ja: チョコミントが好きだろ？

translation.en: Thanks.
Isn't that right, little birdie? Mm-hm.
My beautiful little birdie.
That's gross, Dad.
Nice digs.
You okay?
How you feeling about school tomorrow?
Are you excited?
You can make some new friends.
translation.ja: 新しい友達ができる 今まで 友達はいない

translation.en: Well, that would imply that I had old friends.
translation.ja: 今まで 友達はいない

translation.en: There's gonna be D-bags no matter where you go, right?
translation.ja: ゴミ野郎は どこにでもいる

translation.en: Mom. It's not nice. Sorry.
translation.ja: ママ　口が悪い ごめん

translation.en: It's "douchebags."
"Douchebags"? I was going for "dickbags."
All right. Just remember what I always tell you.
translation.ja: いつも言ってるでしょ

translation.en: Your difference is your power.
translation.ja: 力が あなたの個性よ

translation.en: Okay, on that note, I'm gonna go unpack.
Love you. I love you.
Thank you for just being so cool... Mom. ...about all of this.
translation.ja: 一緒に住むことを 受け入れてくれてありがとう

translation.en: I know it feels fast.
Mom, I'm not judging you at all.
I just have not connected to someone like this for so long, and, God, it just feels really good,
translation.ja: 彼とは すごく性格が合うし 落ち着くの

translation.en: like, you know, to have someone to...
I get it.
All right, baby. Get some rest. Okay.
Oh...love you. Love you.
Love you, love you, love you. Love you, love you.
What's up?
Nice kicks.
Thanks, yo.
Have a good first day.
Thanks.
I know why the caged bird Sings, ah me
translation.ja: “かごの鳥が歌う理由が 分かる”

translation.en: When his wing is bruised And his bosom sore,-- When he beats his bars And he would be free;
translation.ja: “鳥は自由になろうと 傷ついた羽で檻を叩く”

translation.en: But a prayer that he sends From his heart's deep core
translation.ja: “心の底から祈り 懇願する”

translation.en: But a plea, that upward To Heaven he flings--
I know why The caged bird sings!
translation.ja: “かごの鳥が歌う理由が 分かる”

translation.en: Okay, this week we're gonna be reading chapters one through four
translation.ja: それじゃ今週は １章から４章を読む

translation.en: of Maya Angelou's seminal autobiography,
translation.ja: マヤ･アンジェロウの 独創的な自伝だ

translation.en: which draws its title--
translation.ja: マヤ･アンジェロウの 独創的な自伝だ うわ　マジか

translation.en: Ew! God, are you seeing this?
Timmy. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: ティミー すみません

translation.en: TEACHER: Okay, what's going on? TIMMY: Hey.
translation.ja: どうした？ ねえ　ちょっと

translation.en: Hi. I think you dropped something.
It's super gnarly.
translation.ja: おい　何なんだ 静かにしなさい

translation.en: Can we settle down back there, please? Let's go. Jacob.
translation.ja: おい　何なんだ 静かにしなさい ジェイコブ

translation.en: TIMMY: It's like a crime scene.
Hey, hey. All right, enough. Settle down.
translation.ja: いいから 静かにしなさい

translation.en: GIRL 1: Hello?
I think she's in here.
GIRL 2: Hello?
Listen. It happens to everyone. Timmy's just a dick.
translation.ja: 気にしないで ティミーは嫌な奴なの

translation.en: Seriously, don't waste your tears on him. GIRL 2: I mean, you're not alone.
translation.ja: あんな奴のせいで 泣かないで

translation.en: He's made us all cry at one point or another.
translation.ja: 皆 彼に泣かされてる

translation.en: Also, girl,
translation.ja: 随分たくさん血が出たね

translation.en: your flow is heavy and that is something to celebrate.
translation.ja: 随分たくさん血が出たね お祝いしないと

translation.en: Frankie. Frankie, bro.
What? I'm just saying. Aunt Flo's in from the Redland.
translation.ja: 事実じゃん 生理が来たんだし

translation.en: GIRL 1: We brought you some shorts.
I wore 'em in gym, so they're kinda sweaty, but they should fit you.
translation.ja: 体育で はいたやつだけど

translation.en: Okay. Okay, I'll just slide them under the door.
translation.ja: それじゃ ドアの下から渡すから

translation.en: LILY: Thank you.
You can sit with us if you want.
Not that anybody really wants to sit with us anyways.
translation.ja: どうせ誰も 私たちと座らないし

translation.en: Thanks, guys.
Oh, my God. Did he just look at you?
translation.ja: ジェイコブと目が合った？

translation.en: Down, girl. Frankie's been in love
with Jacob since the fifth grade.
translation.ja: フランキーは彼が好きなの

translation.en: [LAUGHING] What? No, no. No.
translation.ja: 違うって　そんなんじゃない

translation.en: No. He's kinda my brother.
translation.ja: 違うって　そんなんじゃない 彼は兄弟って感じで

translation.en: Come a-who?
Stepbrother. Or soon-to-be stepbrother.
translation.ja: もうすぐ義理の兄弟になる

translation.en: Sorry, I just have really bad cramps.
translation.ja: ごめん　お腹が痛い

translation.en: Been there. TABBY: Same.
Can't relate, but sorry.
translation.ja: 私は分かんないけど つらいね

translation.en: Hey, we should hang out after school this week.
translation.ja: 今週のどこかで 放課後に会おうよ

translation.en: Mm-hm. Yeah. Yeah.
Mom?
Hello?
Get out!
Oh, God.
Mmm. You want a sip?
Mom!
You know I can't control myself.
That's very good. Okay, okay.
Show me your dance moves.
That's so sweet.
Hey.
What's all that?
Oh...I just had to go through some paperwork
translation.ja: あなたの学校の 書類を捜してる

translation.en: for your new school, but you know me.
translation.ja: あなたの学校の 書類を捜してる ごちゃごちゃに入れちゃって 見つからない

translation.en: I put all the important shit in a shoebox, and it makes it impossible to find.
translation.ja: ごちゃごちゃに入れちゃって 見つからない

translation.en: Adam says he's gonna get me organized, so I'm taking it down to the office, but I told him not to get his hopes up, so...
translation.ja: 今からアダムが書斎で 一緒に整理してくれる

translation.en: Hey, um, thanks for washing my jeans, by the way.
translation.ja: ジーンズ洗ってくれて ありがとう

translation.en: What jeans?
The ones I bled through today.
I didn't.
Maybe it was Adam.
Look who it is. Just in time for first period.
translation.ja: 生理なのに よく来たな

translation.en: Timmy.
translation.ja: ティミー 腹痛を止めるには⸺

translation.en: You know what helps with cramps?
Sex.
TEACHER: Both of you, principal's office now.
VOICE: Lily.
What?
Ms. Schechner, who are you speaking to?
Didn't you just call my name?
No.
VOICE: If you can hear this, you're our fourth.
translation.ja: 聞こえるなら あなたが４人目よ

translation.en: Go to the bathroom.
Yes?
Can I go to the bathroom?
Sure. Make it quick.
VOICE: Take your stuff.
You need your backpack?
TIMMY: You didn't get the memo? She's on the rag.
translation.ja: 知りません？ 生理中なんです

translation.en: My bad.
That's good. Double detention. Anything else?
translation.ja: 居残り２倍だ　いいな？

translation.en: For what?
Oh, shit! I told y'all haters she was the fourth!
translation.ja: マジ？ やっぱり４人目だ

translation.en: FRANKIE: Yes, yes, y'all! It's the motherfricking reckoning!
translation.ja: ああ　そうだね これで全員そろったよ！

translation.en: I can't even believe this. We on a other, other level.
What the hell, you guys?
We sent you a message telepathically.
Yeah. Just, like, telepathically communicating with you. NBD.
translation.ja: ただのテレパシーだよ 騒がないで

translation.en: JK. It's, like, a VBD for sure, because now you're actually here
translation.ja: いや　実際は すごいことだけどね 本当に来るなんて

translation.en: and we on some shit IRL.
Okay. Can somebody translate?
Okay. It was a test to see if your antennas were up.
And they up! Way up.
translation.ja: あったね あんたには

translation.en: They up! What do you mean? How?
Well, we practiced a lot of times, but we never got it quite right. But, I mean, today, it was like...
translation.ja: テレパシーが伝わったのは これが初めて

translation.en: Super Tampon to the rescue!
translation.ja: タンポンちゃんには 伝わった

translation.en: That's you. Sorry, is it too soon?
translation.ja: あなたのこと 長年 練習を？

translation.en: So how long have you been practicing?
Practicing? Yeah.
Oh. No, I never, like, practiced anything before.
translation.ja: 何も練習なんて したことないけど

translation.en: Okay, so, like, when did you start getting a sense of your gift?
translation.ja: 力に気づいたのは いつ？

translation.en: What are you guys talking about?
What? FRANKIE: We're witches.
Take my hand. It's okay. Come with me. We're gonna learn a lot today.
You're witches? Yep.
And you're a witch too!
LILY: Sorry, this is all just a little new to me.
TABBY: I mean, it's new to us too. We've never thrown a grown-ass man.
translation.ja: 力で男を飛ばすのも 初めてだった

translation.en: LOURDES: That was so wild!
Yeah, and, like, we all thought it at the same time.
translation.ja: 全員で念じたせいだね

translation.en: Wait, what? Tell me you didn't think about throwing his ass off of you.
translation.ja: 突き飛ばそうと 思わなかった？

translation.en: Yeah, I did. LOURDES: Well, so did we!
translation.ja: 思ったよ 私たちも

translation.en: And then, bam!
And that's just stage one, moving stuff with our minds.
translation.ja: 物を動かすのはレベル１

translation.en: LOURDES: Or people, I guess, in Timmy's case.
translation.ja: 物じゃなく人を動かした

translation.en: If he even counts as a person. True that. Anything.
translation.ja: ティミーは“物”だよ 確かに レベル２がテレパシー

translation.en: Stage two? That's what went down in detention.
That was so sick! And you said we couldn't do it.
translation.ja: できたでしょ　私の言う通り

translation.en: Stage three, we'll get to soon enough.
LOURDES: Let's surprise her, though.
Stage four, shape-shifting.
Shape-shifting.
translation.ja: 変形？ 別の姿に変わること

translation.en: You know, the power to take on a different form?
And if we get to stage four, I'm low-key turning myself into Kristen Stewart.
translation.ja: 私はクリステン･ スチュワートみたいになる

translation.en: Don't judge. She's a Twilight stan.
Point is, we've never made it past stage one.
translation.ja: 今まではレベル１止まり

translation.en: And then in walks Robert Pattinson. Bro!
translation.ja: ロバート･ パティンソンのおかげ

translation.en: What? You tell me she's not giving off
translation.ja: 何？ バンパイアっぽいし

translation.en: Edward Cullen vibes right now. I'm sorry, can you guys just slow down? I'm having a hard time catching up.
translation.ja: ちょっと待って 話についていけない

translation.en: Okay, well, why don't you tell us a little about you.
translation.ja: あなたのことを教えて

translation.en: Yeah, like, what's your ancestry?
Uh...I don't really know. I've never looked into it before.
translation.ja: 調べたことないから 分からない

translation.en: FRANKIE: What about your mom?
Is she a witch?
She's a therapist from New Jersey.
translation.ja: ニュージャージー出身の セラピスト

translation.en: It's gotta come from somewhere.
Yeah, you see, we've been looking for our fourth for a while now.
We thought we could form a coven, just us three--
It doesn't work like that.
No, because, you see, we each have an element that corresponds to a direction.
translation.ja: ４つの方位にそれぞれ エレメントがある

translation.en: I'm fire.
Air. Earth.
So you've got North, South, East...
translation.ja: それぞれ北 南 東

translation.en: But West, that was a tough get.
translation.ja: 西だけが いなかった

translation.en: LOURDES: And now you're here.
translation.ja: でも あなたが現れた

translation.en: You're water. You're West.
Yeah, in order for us to have, like, maximum power, we all need to be on our directions.
translation.ja: 力を最大限 出すには 決まった位置に就くの

translation.en: The term is "calling the corners."
Okay. Um...
This is a lot, but I am listening
translation.ja: 今のところ 何とか理解してる

translation.en: and also working through a low-level panic attack.
translation.ja: でも ちょっとだけ パニクってる

translation.en: Okay, we know that this is probably a lot to take in right now.
translation.ja: 急にいろいろ言われても 難しいだろうけど⸺

translation.en: But you shouldn't run from your power.
translation.ja: 自分の力から逃げないで

translation.en: None of us should.
That's what my mom always says. "Your difference is your power."
translation.ja: ママがいつも言ってる 力が私の個性だって

translation.en: Oh, then Mom's cool.
translation.ja: ママ 分かってるね

translation.en: So, what do you say?
Lily.
Give me your hand. Come on.
Will you be our fourth?
Come on, I got bad knees.
Her ACLs are gonna tear.
You had me at shape-shifting into Kristen Stewart.
translation.ja: クリステン･スチュワートに なりたい

translation.en: She said yes! She said yes. Oh, my God!
translation.ja: オッケーだ！ イエスだって！

translation.en: Why didn't you just say yes originally?
I mean, witchcraft in general is such a charged word. We literally house babies in our stomachs.
translation.ja: 女が体に子供を宿すのも ある意味 魔術だよね

translation.en: That's some Ridley Scott shit.
We have superpowers without even trying.
translation.ja: 女は元々 強いんだよ

translation.en: I mean, not all of us can do that, but...
translation.ja: 女が全員 子供を産むわけじゃない

translation.en: Shit. You know, point taken. My bad, Lou.
Yeah, it's all good. Y'all know trans girls got our own magick anyway.
translation.ja: トランスジェンダーは 魔力が強いんだよ

translation.en: Word. They do, they do.
That's why covens have always been so important.
Because half the battle of having powers is believing you do.
translation.ja: 魔術を使うには まず力を信じないと

translation.en: What are we doing?
Well, now that we got our fourth, we need to take our coven for a test drive.
translation.ja: 仲間がそろったし 力を試してみよう

translation.en: FRANKIE: Whenever we do a spell, we always cast a circle first.
translation.ja: まずは必ず円を作るの

translation.en: Think of it as, you know, making a container to hold all of our energies.
translation.ja: エネルギーの 入れ物だと思って

translation.en: And to keep the bad shit out.
Breathe.
Listen to the sound of the trees breathing along with you.
translation.ja: 共に息をする木々の音を聴け

translation.en: Feel yourself rooted into the ground and into this moment.
translation.ja: 地に根差し 今に根差す自分を感じろ

translation.en: We transcend time.
We suspend fate.
We bear the three keys.
[WHISPERS] We open the triple gate.
We open the triple gate.
FRANKIE, LOURDES & TABBY: The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
translation.ja: 風 火 水 土 戻れ 戻れ 戻れ

translation.en: The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
translation.ja: 風 火 水 土 戻れ 戻れ 戻れ

translation.en: ALL [CHANTING]: The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
translation.ja: 風 火 水 土 戻れ 戻れ 戻れ

translation.en: The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
translation.ja: 風 火 水 土 戻れ 戻れ 戻れ

translation.en: The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return.
translation.ja: 風 火 水 土 戻れ 戻れ 戻れ

translation.en: The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
translation.ja: 風 火 水 土 戻れ 戻れ 戻れ

translation.en: Guys.
Holy shit.
Damn!
LOURDES: Oh, my God! That was so fricking cool!
That was brazy, though!
Never?
Yo! No, no, no. No!
FRANKIE: That's stage three, baby. TABBY: Okay, but if we could do that, now what should we do?
translation.ja: すごいのをやれた 次はどうする？

translation.en: Why are we at Timmy's house?
He's a terrorist.
That's a little extreme. We don't wanna hurt him, though, right?
translation.ja: それは言いすぎ ケガはさせないよね？

translation.en: Why not?

translation.ja: 彼自身 抱えきれない秘密を…

translation.en: No.
No, something doesn't add up.
He came to my room last night.
translation.ja: ゆうべ 彼が部屋に来たの

translation.en: And he was...
He told me he felt like a weight lifted.
Just the two of you?
This is stupid, but I did this, like, love spell
translation.ja: バカみたいだけど⸺ 恋の呪文を唱えたら すぐ彼が部屋に来て…

translation.en: and then he came right into my room and he--
translation.ja: 恋の呪文を唱えたら すぐ彼が部屋に来て…

translation.en: He kissed me.
What?
He kissed me.
translation.ja: キスされた 彼はすでに 別の呪文にかかってたのに

translation.en: He was-- He was already under the influence of a spell.
translation.ja: 彼はすでに 別の呪文にかかってたのに

translation.en: This is so jacked up.
I'm sorry, okay? Okay?
translation.ja: 私が間違ってたよ　ごめん！

translation.en: Was all of this just like some game to you?
translation.ja: 全部 遊びだったの？

translation.en: What? All of this work that we did together
translation.ja: 私たちが やったことは 仲間同士の信頼が大事なの

translation.en: was about building trust, about building community
translation.ja: 私たちが やったことは 仲間同士の信頼が大事なの 男に夢中になったからって 勝手なマネをして…

translation.en: and not letting some stupid crush get in the way of everything we've--
translation.ja: 男に夢中になったからって 勝手なマネをして…

translation.en: I know!
Do you?
I think we should take a break from magick.
translation.ja: しばらく魔術は やめよう

translation.en: If we're not gonna use our power responsibly, then we shouldn't be using it at all.
translation.ja: 力に責任を持てないなら やめた方がいい

translation.en: Agreed.
Lily.
ADAM: I wanna talk today about weakness.
translation.ja: 今日は弱さについて語りたい

translation.en: Because when one of us is weak... all of us are weak.
translation.ja: １人の弱みは 全員の弱みになるんだ

translation.en: But how do we alchemize weakness into sovereign power?
translation.ja: どうやって弱さを 絶対的な力に変えるか

translation.en: How do we eliminate the weakest among us so that the strongest can thrive?
translation.ja: 強者が栄えるよう どうやって弱者を排除するか

translation.en: You all know my son Jacob.
translation.ja: ジェイコブは私の息子だ

translation.en: Come here, son.
Dad...
Come here.
My son lost a friend today.
translation.ja: 息子は友人を亡くした

translation.en: No. No, we all face tragedy every day.
translation.ja: 我々は毎日 悲劇に直面する

translation.en: The question is, how do we face it?
translation.ja: 問題は どう立ち向かうか

translation.en: It's okay.
Dad, no. It's okay.
You're not weak.
You're not weak.
He was weak.
It's okay.
You're not weak.
ADAM: Can't sleep? [GASPS]
Me neither.
Lily, I wanna apologize...
translation.ja: リリー　謝りたかったんだ

translation.en: for being so tough on you.
You know, it wasn't always so easy for me, raising three boys on my own.
translation.ja: 一人で息子３人を育てるのは 大変で⸺

translation.en: I had to set very strict rules and keep 'em in line.
translation.ja: しつけのため 厳しいルールを作ってる

translation.en: I know that's not how you and your mom operate...
translation.ja: 君とママのやり方とは 違うだろうな

translation.en: I, um...
I wanted to say that I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 厳しく当たって悪かった

translation.en: Thanks.
I know you were close to Timmy too.
translation.ja: 君もティミーと 親しかったろ？

translation.en: I saw you checking out the old family crest, huh?
translation.ja: 我が家の紋章を見てたのか

translation.en: It's actually pretty cool. These go back centuries.
translation.ja: かっこいいだろ 何世紀も前のものだ

translation.en: You know, um, snakes are usually considered
translation.ja: かっこいいだろ 何世紀も前のものだ ヘビは危険だと 思われてるが⸺

translation.en: scary or dangerous,
translation.ja: ヘビは危険だと 思われてるが⸺

translation.en: but actually in pagan culture, they were symbols of rebirth.
translation.ja: 再生の象徴だとする 宗教もある

translation.en: Anyway, it's getting late. To be continued.
translation.ja: だがもう遅いから 続きは また今度

translation.en: Lily? Are you okay?
Honey. Honey, what happened?
We're not safe. What?
We're not safe here.
Take a breath. Tell me what happened.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて　どうしたの？

translation.en: He's dangerous. Who?
Adam. I'm telling you. What? Did something happen?
translation.ja: アダムはヤバい人だよ 何かされた？

translation.en: Last night, he said...
translation.ja: ゆうべ 言ってたの

translation.en: And I saw... He had a...
translation.ja: それに 手に持ってた

translation.en: I just really think we need to go.
translation.ja: 早く この家を出よう

translation.en: I just really think we should go.
translation.ja: ここを出ないとマズいよ

translation.en: Honestly, Lily, you are going through a lot right now.
translation.ja: いろいろあって 心が追い詰められてるのね

translation.en: Okay.
Okay, um...
Let us go somewhere new. Huh?
Let's just take a road trip, just take a weekend,
just the two of us, somewhere cool, somewhere fun.
translation.ja: どこか楽しい場所へ 出かけるの 気分がよくなるわ

translation.en: That could be good, right?
We just need to make it through the funeral.
translation.ja: とりあえず お葬式は頑張って

translation.en: Then I'll make it right.
translation.ja: その後 考えましょ

translation.en: There's gotta be something here that proves it.
HELEN: Lily?
You ready?
Lily, we gotta go.
translation.ja: リリー　行かないと

translation.en: What the hell is this?
Where did you find that?
You never told me?
Lily.
It's complicated.
No, it's really not. It's, like, a simple conversation that should have happened a long time ago.
translation.ja: 簡単だよ　ずっと昔に 一言 話せばよかっただけ

translation.en: No. You don't--
Hold on. Hold on. No.
Don't touch me!
What? Say it!
It wasn't entirely up to me.
translation.ja: 一人じゃ決められなくて

translation.en: Oh, really? Who else would it have been up to, Mom?
translation.ja: へえ　それじゃ 誰なら決められるの？

translation.en: It was your birth mother.
It was the one condition that she had,
translation.ja: 養子だってことは 絶対に秘密

translation.en: that I never reveal to you, and she's...
translation.ja: 養子だってことは 絶対に秘密 それが彼女の条件だった

translation.en: She didn't want you to know that you were adopted,
translation.ja: 生みの母親の意志よ 絶対に明かさないと 私は約束したの

translation.en: and I made a promise to her and... It was such a...
translation.ja: 絶対に明かさないと 私は約束したの

translation.en: God, it was a complicated...
Why would she want that?
'Cause she...
She had undergone some trauma.
translation.ja: 彼女は とても つらい目に遭って…

translation.en: I was assigned to her at the crisis center here and...
translation.ja: 緊急相談センターで 私がセラピーを行った

translation.en: Baby, I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: リリー　本当にごめんなさい

translation.en: You guys, I need to talk to you.
I don't think that's a good idea.
Listen to me. Please.
translation.ja: 話を聞いて お願い

translation.en: There's no one else I can trust.
translation.ja: 他の誰も信用できない

translation.en: Fine.
Lily. Don't.
You all right?
I need to take her away from here.
translation.ja: リリーをよそへ やらないと

translation.en: I need to put her first.
LOURDES: You guys, she's not gonna harm anyone.
translation.ja: 彼女は誰も傷つけない

translation.en: She already did.
She's just going through some shit.
translation.ja: 彼女 つらいんだよ

translation.en: Yeah, well, what happened to our number one rule of the craft?
translation.ja: だからって 基本ルールを破るわけ？

translation.en: If a person is a danger to herself or others, they will be bound.
translation.ja: “危害を加えうる者の 魔術を封じ込めよ”

translation.en: She used her powers irresponsibly.
translation.ja: 彼女は自分勝手に 力を使った

translation.en: End of story.
But, like, are we any better, though?
I mean, like, what we did to Timmy.
translation.ja: ティミーに 魔術をかけたけど⸺

translation.en: That wasn't consensual either.
translation.ja: 全員の同意は取ってない

translation.en: Well, then maybe we should bind ourselves too.
translation.ja: じゃ 私たちも 魔術は使用禁止

translation.en: We are bound to each other
and bound from magick.
We prevent ourselves from doing harm.
translation.ja: 誰にも危害は加えない

translation.en: We relinquish our powers from this day forth.
translation.ja: この日から 持てる力を放棄する

translation.en: ALL: So mote it be.
Let's go.
What?
You were right. I never should've brought you here.
translation.ja: あなたを連れてきたのは 間違いだった

translation.en: But I need you to agree to one thing.
Whatever this is, whatever's happening here...
translation.ja: あなたが 私にやったようなことは⸺

translation.en: I need you to stop it.
What do you mean?
I should've told you.
translation.ja: 言っておくべきだった

translation.en: Not just about your birth mother, but about...
translation.ja: 生みの母親のこと だけでなく⸺

translation.en: About these...
These powers.
Whatever you call them, Lily, they're--
You knew?
I'm sorry.
I was warned...
that your legacy was a curse.
And that the second they came online, I would have to stop them in their tracks, so Lily--
translation.ja: 力を使ったら 私は即座に止める

translation.en: Lily, please.
let me take the burden for you.
Let me take your curse so you don't have to carry it.
translation.ja: あなたの受け継いだ呪いを 私に解かせて

translation.en: It has been so painful, you can't imagine...
translation.ja: あなたを見ているのが すごく つらいわ

translation.en: to watch you understand that you were different and not know why.
translation.ja: 自分が普通じゃないことを 悟るなんて

translation.en: Now you can see why your difference...
translation.ja: 分かったでしょ あなたの個性は⸺

translation.en: is dangerous.
But I need you to say it with me, Lily.
In the name of Manon...
I give you my power.
You can trust me.
I'm your mother.
My mother would never tell me my difference is dangerous.
translation.ja: 個性が危険だなんて よくも

translation.en: Guys?
killed...
me."
You guys.
Who is it?
LOURDES: "T...
Those don't seem to be working anymore.
Thanks to your so-called friends.
You see, that's the thing about girls with power, Lily. They're always too weak not to use it against each other.
translation.ja: 女ってのは実に ひ弱だ 互いに対して力を使えない

translation.en: What do you want from me?
That's an excellent question.
Oh, you see, Lily....
I want your power.
Where's my mother?
Which one?
Helen.
She's tied up at the moment.
translation.ja: 今ちょっと 身動き取れないようだ

translation.en: Your real mom....
translation.ja: 実の母親の方も 身動き取れない

translation.en: Well, she's tied up too, in a different way.
translation.ja: 実の母親の方も 身動き取れない 違う意味でね

translation.en: You're a lot like her. You know, she fought it at first,
translation.ja: 君は母親似だな 彼女も初めは抵抗した

translation.en: but eventually she gave in.
translation.ja: だが結局 降参した

translation.en: You see, Lily, in order to gain a witch's power, she has to give them up voluntarily.
translation.ja: 自ら差し出してもらわねば 力を奪えない

translation.en: So you do have a choice here.
We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
translation.ja: 楽な方か つらい方か

translation.en: You'll have to kill me first.
translation.ja: 私を殺さなきゃ奪えない

translation.en: So the easy way.
You guys came for me.
There's no I in "sisterhood," baby.
There is definitely an I in "sisterhood."
FRANKIE: You get my meaning.
What we were saying was.... We're sorry.
translation.ja: つまり… 悪かったわ

translation.en: We love you, and we unbind you, Lily.
translation.ja: 魔術の使用禁止を解く

translation.en: Guys.
You girls ought to be careful in the woods at night.
A lot of weirdos out here.
We are the weirdos, mister.
No!
You see, Lily, power is order.
translation.ja: いいか　力は⸺ 秩序だ

translation.en: It belongs in the hands of those who understand it.
translation.ja: それを知らねば力は持てん

translation.en: It's been that way for thousands of years.
translation.ja: 何千年も前からそうだ

translation.en: Timmy's a good example of that.
translation.ja: ティミーがいい例だった

translation.en: Until you tried to make him in your own image.
translation.ja: だが君らが彼を弱くした

translation.en: So then I had to kill him...
to restore the order.
Because we are not in your image.
translation.ja: 男と女は 生まれながらに違うのだ

translation.en: We are your rulers and kings.
translation.ja: 我々は君たちの支配者なのだ

translation.en: The thing is, Lily, you got yourself here.
translation.ja: リリー 君が自らまいた種だぞ

translation.en: But you're playing with fire,
and I'm gonna watch you burn.
TABBY: South.
LOURDES: East.
FRANKIE: North.
Where do you think you're going?
West.
GIRLS [CHANTING]: Air, fire, water, earth. Air, fire, water, earth.
translation.ja: 風 火 水 土 風 火 水 土…

translation.en: GIRLS [CHANTING]: Fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire.
translation.ja: いでよ　火の精霊 火よ　火よ

translation.en: Lily!
Now it's your turn to burn.
Big day.
Text us after, okay?
I will.
And take pics.
That I can't promise.
Hey, girls.
Hey, Ms. Schechner. Hi.
How's the warlock dating pool treatin' ya? Are you steering clear?
translation.ja: 今は魔女ハンターと 付き合ってない？

translation.en: LILY: Frankie!
What? It's too soon?
A little, yeah.
FRANKIE: It's just a joke.
But, also, not really because we almost did die.
translation.ja: 私たち 実際に 死にかけたけど

translation.en: All right, let's hit the road, baby girl.
translation.ja: さあ行くわよ　リリー

translation.en: Okay.
Good luck. Thank you.
Hey, you got this.
Love you. Love you.
LILY: Love you. FRANKIE: I love you.
You ready?
I'm looking for...
And what is your relation?
Can I help you?
My name is Lily.
And, um...
I'm your daughter.
